headline: Gartner (IT): Exploring Current Valuation After Notable Share Price Decline
summary: Gartner (IT) stock has seen some movement recently, catching the eye of investors interested in its valuation and performance after a challenging stretch. Let’s take a quick look at what the numbers tell us so far. See our latest analysis for Gartner. Gartner’s share price has stumbled nearly 49% year-to-date, reflecting a sharp correction after years of growth. Its 12-month total shareholder return sits even lower at -51%. Momentum has faded lately, suggesting the market is reassessing the...

headline: LogicGate Named A Leader in the GRC Market by the Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for GRC Tools, Assurance Leaders
summary: LogicGate, the leading AI-powered enterprise GRC platform, today announced it was named a Leader in the GRC Market by the Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for GRC Tools, Assurance Leaders. Gartner identified LogicGate as a Leader amongst its peers for both vision and execution, which we believe highlights the company's proven ability to deliver results with consistency and excellence.
